tweets.text: @thameswater I would like to raise an official complaint as it is causing material distress and material inconvenience.
Hopefully, maybe.. we will hear something more today about what @EnvAgencyMids intend to do about this? https://t.co/OYsQRytRi1 https://t.co/m4WcOSA1z4
@scottdegg @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe We are getting to 'enjoy' the stink in Oakhill nowadays mate, last 3 nights been horrible.

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 This means nothing to the residents of Newcastle under Lyme and stoke on Trent. That landfill isn‚Äôt a landfill  anymore, it‚Äôs a 4/5 storey pile of crap and growing !!! It just needs shutting down and covering up.

The #stink was strong this morning as I walked my dog. TBH I can't remember a day in the past 6 months or more when I couldn't smell this disgusting landfill around Newcastle, Silverdale, and Keele. #stopthestink @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @NewsNBC https://t.co/jhUvADHRMY

tweets.text:
Read our latest update regarding #WalleysQuarry landfill site run by @RedIndustries2 #NewcastleUnderLyme on our dedicated webpage: https://t.co/o558iAVicn 

Please report any concerns regarding the site by email to ics@environment-agency.gov.uk https://t.co/GF8HqbhiSV
So a week later and 2 visits of someone having a look @thameswater the same raw sewage is still polluting my nose and the watercourse. @TheHWPC @DefraGovUK any help please?
@GIS4Schools @AnnekaFrance @LivingAtlas I haven't looked at the original @EnvAgency dataset but assume it's a data entry error?

Are you watching @BBCTheOneShow tonight?

Keep a look out for Declan, who last year, was the first person to successfully complete the new @GetIntoFishing Awards programme, entered BBC Young Reporter - and won! üëèüèº

Tune in at 7pm for the full piece! #TheOneShow https://t.co/xVT1ib7vMM

tweets.text: @GIS4Schools @AnnekaFrance @LivingAtlas I checked a couple and they have the wrong grid ref in the attributes, eg that Lincs example is TF9875 but should be SK9875.

We've just taken delivery of our biggest batch of electric vehicles to date - 25 electric vans to help us save over 300 tonnes of carbon emissions.

We'll replace all our diesel vans with electric in the next 5 years, helping us reach #netzero by 2030.

#TogetherForOurPlanet https://t.co/eyMQXNY55s

urls.title: Close season crackdown launched on the Tees - Angling Trust
urls.description: The Angling Trust Fisheries Enforcement Support Service (FESS) and the Environment Agency marked the start of Operation Clampdown 9 ‚Äì the annual crackdown on illegal fishing during the coarse fish close season on rivers ‚Äì with a regional launch patrol on the River Tees in the North East of England. FESS National Enforcement Support Manager, [‚Ä¶]

tweets.text: Our Fisheries Enforcement Support Service and @EnvAgencyYNE partners launched Operation Clampdown 9 ‚Äì targeting illegal #fishing nationwide during the close season ‚Äì with local volunteer bailiffs and @ClevelandPolice on the River Tees. Read more - https://t.co/J1aVMxpjIQ #OCD9

urls.title: WWT responds to Environment Agency‚Äôs warning that reaching net zero ‚Äònot enough to save our planet‚Äô
urls.description: Environment Agency Chief Executive Sir James Bevan warned government and business on Tuesday (16 March) that we need climate adaptation measures as well as net zero ambitions, describing them as ‚Äútwo sides of the same coin‚Äù.

tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency says: üì¢ #NetZero is not enough to save the planet; climate adaption measures are vital too.

We say: üì¢ Wetlands are the answer!

Our #BlueRecovery plan to create and restore 100k hectares of wetlands will help the UK adapt and thrive > https://t.co/VtC4Cmgvvh https://t.co/4GgVoODeu0

An absolute pleasure to be supporting our Hydrometric & Telemetry team in future proofing river level monitoring. And a chance to travel with #ZeroEmissions #zeroCarbon #emission2030 #NetZero @EnvAgencySW https://t.co/uDqhULDn8o https://t.co/ankFxvGdbW

tweets.text:
Great day of all things @DCfieldteamsEA ... first up a trip to Exmoor planning future installs.
Then a quick drive by of Trekeivesteps where the new hut is almost complete. Brilliant craft as always, thanks so much @EnvAgencySW https://t.co/JWHBGapmE8

@ciderboy10 @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Well, just been my mothers in Trentham it‚Äôs 5 miles away...Guess what? It stinks üò∑ unbelievable... She now has the EA‚Äôs number and her first reference @EnvAgency I‚Äôm embarrassed for you...it out of control #stopthestink @StinkStopthe
Hey @EnvAgency what are you proposing to do about this? Who else needs to be involved? Would love to know - this is a Heavily designated wildlife site. https://t.co/zgWOSnJ9Mn

tweets.text: @GarethTrewick @EnvAgency And what about all the extra production of these things?..All i am saying is they are not 100% green at all...

@gray2438 @EnvAgency Latest gov figures for electricity production showed only 4.9% of electric came from oil and coal. Compared with 40.9% natural gas, 23.8 wind, 17.3 nuclear and 1.8% hydro. The other 11.5% is ‚Äúother‚Äùrenewables. So oil and coal very much not where supply comes from.

tweets.text: @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids No news from the EA? Not a surprise...  Tonight we require the @NewsNBC to act, don‚Äôt let your community down #stopthestink @StinkStopthe people‚Äôs future depends on tonight yours and ours...

Absolutely crazy that @NEYorksNLincs are allowing serious volume of water to leave #Hatfield Moors #Doncaster Do they need reminding that around 50% of the moor was devastated by a #wildfire May-July 2020ü§îüò¢ We need to keep water on the moor so it is more resilientüëç @EnvAgency https://t.co/jB8dVDnBBW

@ciderboy10 @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe üò≥ my pal in Penkhull has had the same for the last 3 nights, off the scale ü§Æit‚Äôs miles away...it‚Äôs completely unacceptable, so many health issues emerging... action must be taken tonight,  it‚Äôs out of control

This week we‚Äôre clearing flood debris and damaged trees from the island in the River #Don at #Neepsend, #Sheffield to help reduce #flood risk. We‚Äôre removing debris caught on the island because it could restrict the flow of the Don.  #floodaware @SheffCouncil https://t.co/pLjG7Am0wm

üö® @EnvAgencyMids say a ‚Äòsignificant breach‚Äô has taken place at Walleys Quarry landfillüëá and that it was ‚Äònot acceptable‚Äô. It‚Äôs time the EA ordered it to be close down and capped off. Enough is enough. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Gu9Ziz12vU
Our Leicester field team have been busy removing a build-up of silt around bridge arches on the Sileby Brook to help increase channel capacity and reduce flood risk https://t.co/71TGqmF0PG

Our #SuDS planters at Holy Trinity CofE Junior School have been transformed with wildlife features, planting and water chutes! All set to spring into life as the warm weather approaches.
#SuDS #SuDSinschools #SuDSnotFloods @EnvAgencySE @SuttonCouncil @Sudsulike @Thames_RvrsTrst https://t.co/j32hLwKl9y

tweets.text:
Im sick of flooding can the @EnvAgency please look at what the Dutch to control rain fall remember you used to be called the National rivers authority üò°
#ollyblogs #LockdownLearning  #OllyRants #flooding #farming https://t.co/109bZBoZ6S
@EnvAgency and where you think most of the power is from that you charge them with? oil and coal lol...

@jono_morgan Thanks @jono_morgan , this is my patch as Volunteer Flood Warden for Sileby. Alot of Partnership work with @EnvAgencyMids , @SilebyPC , @CharnwoodBC & @LeicsCountyHall  for this work to get underway.
Look @SpilsburyKev @theBREWery22 @LR4x4Response @benvolresponder @BBCLeicester

It‚Äôs illegal to coarse fish on rivers during close season from 15 March and 15 June. This is to protect spawning #fish. 

Our officers are patrolling across Hertfordshire and North London. 

You can report illegal activity on 0800 80 70 60. https://t.co/YF7uLgTgPE

Are you based in West Woodburn? Could you volunteer as a Flood Warden & help your community? We need local people to join an active group as eyes and ears on the ground & helping to get information out to local residents quickly during an incident. #flood https://t.co/NZJkFZsWw0

On 22/3/21 we will be carrying out repairs to Eastoke beach, Hayling Island @HavantBorough. This essential work is funded by @EnvAgency
We anticipate this campaign will last for 1 week. 

Please take extra care if you are visiting this area.
For more info https://t.co/C0OnjMCz46

urls.title: [Withdrawn] Apply for a grant from the natural environment investment readiness fund
urls.description: Grants to prepare innovative nature projects in England that can attract private financial investment. Find out what the fund is for and how to apply.

tweets.text:

If you‚Äôre an organisation interested in receiving a grant, apply now: https://t.co/TJnC6BasA7 https://t.co/XBwYnRcBFM
